name: Duplestory English Translation
description:
THIS IS ONLY A TRANSLATION. THIS IS NOT MY GAME OR CREATION IN ANY WAY. ALL CREDIT GOES TO NAGO MIE, ASTER, AND VIENNE.
Made by the same team as Forgotten Wings, Duplestory involves characters from the same game, on thier own adventure, throughout the deserts of Riabata, attempting to return to a colony of Giants. Control Melmern and Gillgot and use thier abilities to attack from afar or move heavy objects. Help out the desert town, and save them from an eternal drought! Will be updated on occasion, and the translation is not complete as of now.
